DOC.brief_summary: The aim study assess increase daily physical activity electronic self-monitoring , compare value 10.000 step program , compare real-time feedback without guidance Personal Coach .
DOC.brief_title: The Impact Real-time Feedback Physical Activity Patterns Flemish Employees
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose intervention study determine effectiveness continuous self-monitoring real-time feedback SenseWear Armband ( BodyMedia ) alone combination Personal Coaching enhance physical activity influence consciousness physical activity pattern 12-month period sedentary Flemish employee . The investigator hypothesize use feedback increase awareness subsequent physical activity level inactive office worker . Another hypothesizes weekly meeting Personal Coach add control element therefore employee 'coaching group ' high physical activity level end intervention period compare group .
